# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (no other drill found) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of 
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of 
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)
-  Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
- Ensure that burner mining drills and burners have fuel before they can operate.
- Ensure that boilers have fuel before they can operate.

### Errors when entities are not connected
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the power grid.
- Ensure that entities are properly connected to each other.

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Ensure that burner inserters have source items to operate.
- Ensure that entities have the necessary items to function.

### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into the electric network.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
